episode: I have a chronic illness that I have been dealing with for decades.  I recently went to the doctor who said that I was one of the best patients with this disease that she has seen.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I have been dealing with a chronic illness for most of my life.  Type 1 Diabetes.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds really tough. How have you been managing it lately?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's tough, but I recently went to the doctor.  The doctor said that I was one of the most well-controlled Type 1 Diabetics that she has seen.  That helped to encourage me.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's amazing! Sounds like you're doing a great job managing it. Keep it up!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you!  It's really difficult.  There are no vacations.  But, little bits of inspiration have helped me to keep on pressing forward.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's great to hear! Keep finding those bits of inspiration. You're doing amazing!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Sometimes, you have to just take one day at a time.  It can get overwhelming trying to balance everything.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely, just focus on today. You're doing great!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My doctor wanted to know what my routine was because I was doing so well with the disease.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's so impressive! You should be proud.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am.  I am also fortunate because I stumbled upon certain strategies that helped me to control this illness.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome! Those strategies are clearly working for you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you.  Technology advancements have also helped me along the way.  It has definitely made it easier.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's great to hear! Technology can be such a game-changer.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I wish I had some of this technology as a child.  It would have made my life and my parent's lives much more easier.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I can imagine. It's amazing how far tech has come!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's truly amazing.  I think the technology combined with my mastery of the basics have allowed me to go far.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's fantastic! You're doing an incredible job.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I hope I can help some other Type 1 Diabetics who may need some help along the way.  I want people to feel like they aren't alone.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a wonderful goal! You can make a real difference.
